title: Weekly Happy Hour
description: Join ACM and chat with some of your fellow members! Enjoy free food on us as you get a chance to know your peers better!

title: ACM Semi-Formal
description: ACM, DSC, and IEEE proudly present our Old Hollywood Semi-Formal! Celebrate with a night filled with dancing, desserts, and drinks!

title: ACM Bar Crawl
description: Join ACM and meet your fellow members as we visit KAMS, Joe's, and Legends on our semesterly bar crawl! Get a free t-shirt with sign-up! Alcohol will be provided by ACM to members over 21 wearing bar crawl t-shirts. We will also be hosting an official pregame (details released closer to the event)! This ticket does not pay for cover at the bars.
